nodes.text: Beacon 784432 was located on Coruscant, known at that time as Imperial Center, around 0 ABY. The beacon, which helped lead unfortunate individuals directly to Emperor Palpatine and later to Ysanne Isard, was located in Tower 78, level 443, landing bay 2. The shuttle Objurium used Beacon 784432 to guide Darth Vader to Palpatine immediately after the first Death Star's explosion and Kirtan Loor to see Isard to later explain the death of Gil Bastra.
